div.bibl: LIETUVA, Vol. XVI, No. 13, 3-29, 1907. NEW LITHUANIAN ORCHESTRA.

body.p: Hereby we announce to brother Lithuanians, that we have organized a new society under the name "Association of the Lithuanian Musicians of America." This society was established on February 14, 1907. We announce that this society has arranged a concert on May 19, 1907. Perhaps, not all of you know what the concert is, come on that evening and you will learn. Admission only - 25 cents.
